title: Other Voices
overview: Other Voices is a critically acclaimed live music series which broadcasts on Irish public service broadcaster RTÃ‰2. Each episode features live musical performances from both Irish and international artists. Other Voices is known for introducing audiences to the most hotly tipped, exhilarating new artists each year and with performances from musicians. The show (previously called Other Voices: Songs from a Room) first aired in 2003. It is currently Ireland's leading live music series which focuses mainly on alternative music from Irish and international artists. Each December over three days a season is filmed in Dingle, County Kerry, Ireland during the Other Voices Music Festival.
